summary:
NOTE: This mod has been absorbed into a larger mod I\'m calling Sporacle\'s Follower Collection. Which contains several different new Followers & an updated version of Ardman.

A simple follower mod that adds a redguard mage to the game.
descriptionHtml:
NOTE: This mod has been absorbed into a larger mod I\'m calling Sporacle\'s Follower Collection. Which contains several different new Followers & an updated version of Ardman.

Ardman is a magic focused follower who resides at Bits & Pieces in Solitude. There\'s nothing too unique about him.
author: SporacleD
